abstract: The brand’s campaign has as its centerpiece the song “Anywhere in the World,” written by Mark Ronson and Katy B. The song incorporates the sounds of athletes who hope to compete in the Games.
snippet: The brand’s campaign has as its centerpiece the song “Anywhere in the World,” written by Mark Ronson and Katy B. The song incorporates the sounds of athletes who hope to compete in the Games.
lead_paragraph: Although the Super Bowl ended only 10 days ago, Coca-Cola, a major Super Bowl sponsor, is already turning its attention to the next big event on the sports calendar, the 2012 Summer Olympics in London.

headline.main: Coca-Cola’s Olympics Advertising Puts Athletics to Music
